titles.title: Inspired to Serve Hiring Improvements Act
Inspired to Serve Hiring Improvements Act
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide flexibility for temporary and term appointments in the competitive service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Inspired to Serve Hiring Improvements Act
This bill expands the hiring authorities of executive agencies, including by increasing the maximum length of temporary and term appointments to up to 3 years (including extensions) and up to 10 years, respectively.
